name: The Kirgingston Hacker
description:
STORY

You are a local hacker who got access to the Kirgingston City console.

Now your task is to guess the passwords in order to get as much information as possible.

GAMEPLAY

You have to guess passwords, and in order to do so you get anagram hints wich you have to solve.

CONTROLS

Click on the game-window first. Now you use the console with your Keyboard. Note that you can always type in "menu" in order to return to the main menu.

CREDITS

This game was made with help of the Complete Unity Developer Course 2.0.
